content: Fix test_block_by_uninvolved_user: Expected 403 but got 404 - needs proper permission checking in block action
Fix test_update_friendship_status_ignored: Status field should be read-only but is currently being updated via PATCH
Fix test_friendship_serializer_fields: Missing 'from_user_details' and 'to_user_details' fields in FriendshipSerializer
Fix test_friendship_user_details: Ensure user detail fields have proper structure with username and email
Run the complete friendship API test suite to ensure no other tests were broken
